snippet: The company, which makes Oreos, said revenue fell during the third quarter, dragged down by declines in saturated markets like the United States and Europe.
lead_paragraph: The company, which makes Oreos, said revenue fell during the third quarter, dragged down by declines in saturated markets like the United States and Europe.

headline.main: Mondolez Raises Outlook on Strength of Cost-Cutting
headline.print_headline: Mondolez Raises Outlook On Strength of Cost-Cutting
